Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 28 points, Chet Holmgren added 25 points, 14 rebounds, 5 assists, and 4 blocks.
Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 16 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds.
Aaron Wiggins added 15 points off the bench.
The Thunder's bench outscored the Nuggets' reserves 25-16.
Before the game, Denver players and coaches paid tribute to the late Dikembe Mutombo with T-shirts and a video tribute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder opened the regular season with the youngest roster in the league, averaging 24 years and 148 days.
